title: weekends
body: are horrible on this game. chat is filled with profanity and toxicity. Games are full of ragequiters and feeders and trolls.

replies.body: i played  10 games today and i only had 1 troll which we used 2 our advantage
It's all the Twelvies that aren't at school man.
they go away after like 8pm or so. probably 8 years old and have  a bed time. night games can be nice
Happens everyday. Seems to happen more frequently on the weekend since more people are on, but its  regular thing. Even in normals probably happens once every 3 games atleast.
